prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a mysterious aura and hypnotic features.
Imagine a psychic Pokemon that uses its powers to manipulate shadows.
Design a bipedal creature with tentacle-like arms and an eerie smile.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and blends with city life.
Show me a creature that combines dark and psychic abilities with a regal appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that can hypnotize opponents with its mesmerizing gaze.
Make a villainous-looking Pokemon that commands respect and fear in battles.
